result.eng: He was a soldier during the war.
result.ga: Bhí sé ina shaighdiúir aimsir an chogaidh

result.eng: They left the country during the famine.
result.ga: D'fhág siad an tír aimsir an ghorta

result.html: Bhí an aimsir go deasThe weather was nice.

result.html: Conas atá an aimsirHow is the weather?

result.html: Cén aimsir atá gealltaWhat's the weather forecast?

result.eng: From this day on the weather usually worsens.
result.ga: Is ag dul i ndonacht a bhíonn an aimsir ón lá seo amach
result.orig: Is ag dul i ndonacht a bhíonn an aimsir ón lá seo amach
result.html: Is ag dul i ndonacht a bhíonn an aimsir ón lá seo amachFrom this day on the weather usually worsens.
result.ponchtml: Is ag dul i ndonaċt a ḃíonn an aimsir ón lá seo amaċFrom this day on the weather usually worsens.

result.html: Is olc an aimsir íIt is terrible weather.
result.ponchtml: Is olc an aimsir íIt is terrible weather.

result.html: Tá an aimsir go breáThe weather is fine.
result.ponchtml: Tá an aimsir go breáThe weather is fine.

result.html: Tá an aimsir go hainnisThe weather is awful.

result.html: Tá an aimsir go hiontachThe weather is wonderful.
result.ponchtml: Tá an aimsir go hiontaċThe weather is wonderful.

result.ga: Tá cuma na báistí ar an aimsir
result.orig: Tá cuma na báistí ar an aimsir
result.html: Tá cuma na báistí ar an aimsirIt looks like rain.

result.html: Tá feabhas ar an aimsirThe weather has improved.

result.html: Conas tá an aimsirWhat's the weather like?

result.ga: Cén chaoi a raibh an aimsir

result.ponchtml: Cén ċaoi a raiḃ an aimsirHow was the weather?

result.eng: I am sorry, but I am extremely tired and the weather is awful.
result.ga: Tá brón orm ach tá tuirse an domhain orm agus tá an aimsir uafásach
result.orig: Tá brón orm ach tá tuirse an domhain orm agus tá an aimsir uafásach
result.html: Tá brón orm ach tá tuirse an domhain orm agus tá an aimsir uafásachI am sorry, but I am extremely tired and the weather is awful.
result.ponchtml: Tá brón orm aċ tá tuirse an doṁain orm agus tá an aimsir uafásaċI am sorry, but I am extremely tired and the weather is awful.

result.eng: I love to go there and lie under the sun when the weather is good.
result.ga: Is breá liom dul ansin agus luí faoin ngrian nuair a bhíonn an aimsir go maith
result.orig: Is breá liom dul ansin agus luí faoin ngrian nuair a bhíonn an aimsir go maith
result.html: Is breá liom dul ansin agus luí faoin ngrian nuair a bhíonn an aimsir go maithI love to go there and lie under the sun when the weather is good.
result.ponchtml: Is breá liom dul ansin agus luí faoin ngrian nuair a ḃíonn an aimsir go maiṫI love to go there and lie under the sun when the weather is good.

result.eng: It's not just the weather's fault.
result.ga: Ní hí an aimsir amháin faoi deara é
result.orig: Ní hí an aimsir amháin faoi deara é
result.html: Ní hí an aimsir amháin faoi deara éIt's not just the weather's fault.
result.ponchtml: Ní hí an aimsir aṁáin faoi deara éIt's not just the weather's fault.

result.eng: Spies were being exchanged here during the cold war.
